scripts.copy-files:hitas: mkdir -p dist/react/hitas && cp build/static/js/main.*.chunk.js dist/react/hitas/asu_react_main.js && cp build/static/js/runtime-main.*.js dist/react/hitas/asu_react_runtime-main.js && cp build/static/js/[0-9]*.*.chunk.js dist/react/hitas/asu_react_vendors.js && cp build/static/js/*.map dist/react/hitas && cp build/static/css/main.*.css dist/react/hitas/asu_react_main.css && cp build/static/css/[0-9].*.css dist/react/hitas/asu_react_vendors.css && cp build/static/css/*.map dist/react/hitas
scripts.copy-files:hitas-upcoming: mkdir -p dist/react/hitas_upcoming && cp build/static/js/main.*.chunk.js dist/react/hitas_upcoming/asu_react_main.js && cp build/static/js/runtime-main.*.js dist/react/hitas_upcoming/asu_react_runtime-main.js && cp build/static/js/[0-9]*.*.chunk.js dist/react/hitas_upcoming/asu_react_vendors.js && cp build/static/js/*.map dist/react/hitas_upcoming && cp build/static/css/main.*.css dist/react/hitas_upcoming/asu_react_main.css && cp build/static/css/[0-9].*.css dist/react/hitas_upcoming/asu_react_vendors.css && cp build/static/css/*.map dist/react/hitas_upcoming
scripts.copy-files:haso: mkdir -p dist/react/haso && cp build/static/js/main.*.chunk.js dist/react/haso/asu_react_main.js && cp build/static/js/runtime-main.*.js dist/react/haso/asu_react_runtime-main.js && cp build/static/js/[0-9]*.*.chunk.js dist/react/haso/asu_react_vendors.js && cp build/static/js/*.map dist/react/haso && cp build/static/css/main.*.css dist/react/haso/asu_react_main.css && cp build/static/css/[0-9].*.css dist/react/haso/asu_react_vendors.css && cp build/static/css/*.map dist/react/haso
scripts.copy-files:haso-upcoming: mkdir -p dist/react/haso_upcoming && cp build/static/js/main.*.chunk.js dist/react/haso_upcoming/asu_react_main.js && cp build/static/js/runtime-main.*.js dist/react/haso_upcoming/asu_react_runtime-main.js && cp build/static/js/[0-9]*.*.chunk.js dist/react/haso_upcoming/asu_react_vendors.js && cp build/static/js/*.map dist/react/haso_upcoming && cp build/static/css/main.*.css dist/react/haso_upcoming/asu_react_main.css && cp build/static/css/[0-9].*.css dist/react/haso_upcoming/asu_react_vendors.css && cp build/static/css/*.map dist/react/haso_upcoming
scripts.dist: rimraf dist && npm run create-dist-package-folder && npm run create-hitas && npm run copy-files:hitas && npm run create-hitas-upcoming && npm run copy-files:hitas-upcoming && npm run create-haso && npm run copy-files:haso && npm run create-haso-upcoming && npm run copy-files:haso-upcoming && npm run create-zip
